name: test-driving-lambdas
description: This project hosts visual studio code server and localstack.

scripts.integration: npm run localstack && jest && npm run stop_localstack
scripts.localstack: docker run --rm -d -p 4566:4566 -p 4571:4571 --name localstack --network code-server-network --network-alias localstack -e LAMBDA_EXECUTOR=docker -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock localstack/localstack -e DEBUG=1 --name localstack
scripts.stop_localstack: docker container stop $(docker container ls -q --filter name=localstack*)

author: braden rupp
